sentences.sContent: The second tenet to help nourish the joints is to become still and muscularly soft, allowing gravity to have us.
sentences.sContent_eng: The second tenet to help nourish the joints is to become still and muscularly soft, allowing gravity to have us.
sentences.sCn: 第二个能够帮助滋养关节的原则是，保持静止并让肌肉柔软放松，让重力来帮助我们。
